item.title: Tensorflow：多版本部署、系统配置与版本切换
item.description: Building Environments for Cellassign and CellBLAST with multiple Tensorflow (GPU) Versions on Ubuntu As promised, I will write about my experience with installing tensorflow. Why did I ever have to build Tensorflow myself? The reason is that I was trying to use two tools: cellassign and Cell_BLAST, but they depend on different tensorflow versions. To make them both work, I used the following build strategy that allows different Tensorflow versions installed and run in separate conda environments.
